{"step_by_step_thinking": "The lymphatic drainage of the face is divided into two parts. The upper face, which includes the area above the lower border of the nose, drains into the preauricular and parotid nodes. The lower face, which includes the area below the lower border of the nose, drains into the submandibular and submental nodes. The middle part of the lower lip drains into the submental nodes.", "answer_choice": "B. Submental nodes"}
